Module dunbar.c195pa
Package dunbar.c195pa.Main

Class TimeMachine

java.lang.Object
dunbar.c195pa.Main.TimeMachine
public abstract class TimeMachine extends Object
Contains all methods used to convert and compare dates and times for the program.

    • checkAvailability

      public static boolean checkAvailability(LocalDate startDate, LocalTime startTime, LocalDate endDate, LocalTime endTime) throws SQLException
      Checks for valid appointment start and end dates and times. Includes logical checks and existing appointment overlap checks. Overloaded method - This version is used for new appointments
      Parameters:
      endDate - new appointment desired end date
      endTime - new appointment desired end time
      startDate - new appointment desired start date
      startTime - new appointment desired start time
      Returns:
      Returns false if the start time is in the past, if the end time is before the start time, if the appointment starts within office hours but extends outside of office hours, or if the appointment overlaps with an existing appointment. Otherwise, returns true.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • checkAvailability

      public static boolean checkAvailability(LocalDate startDate, LocalTime startTime, LocalDate endDate, LocalTime endTime, int selectedAppointmentID) throws SQLException
      Checks for valid appointment start and end dates and times. Includes logical checks and existing appointment overlap checks.Overloaded method - This version is for appointments being updated.
      Parameters:
      endDate - new appointment desired end date
      endTime - new appointment desired end time
      startDate - new appointment desired start date
      startTime - new appointment desired start time
      selectedAppointmentID - ID of the appointment being updated.
      Returns:
      Returns false if the start time is in the past, if the end time is before the start time, if the appointment starts within office hours but extends outside of office hours, or if the appointment overlaps with an existing appointment. Otherwise, returns true.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getEndWeek
